content.text: I'll help you create a git commit for the timer duration customization feature. Let me first check what changes have been made.

input.description: Check what changes have been made

content.text: Now I'll stage all changes and create the commit:

input.command:
git add -A && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
sdlc_implementor: feature: add timer duration customization

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
